snippet: A grand jury declined to indict a white officer in the fatal shooting of a 19-year-old black man during a fight at a traffic stop.
abstract: Grand jury in Tennessee declines to indict white Police Officer Connor Schilling, who fatally shot black teenager Darrius Stewart at a traffic stop in Memphis.
lead_paragraph: A grand jury declined to indict a white officer in the fatal shooting of a 19-year-old black man during a fight at a traffic stop.

headline.main: Tennessee: No Charge for Officer in Killing at Traffic Stop
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: No Charge for Officer in Killing at Memphis Traffic Stop
